qualifiers.applicability: Applies if the average of the existing setbacks on the same side of the block is 30' or greater

procedures: Determine if a contextual setback applies using Figure 15 as an example

mandatory: Block must have more than 3 lots including the project lot

conditional_logic.condition: If block is more than 600' long
If the number of remaining lots is 5 or more
conditional_logic.action: Exclude the smallest and largest setbacks

special_cases: Exclude flag lots, multi-family use with 3+ units, and corner lots facing cross street

logical_dependencies: Average of remaining lots' setbacks must be greater than 30' for contextual setback to apply
